title: Website updates

properties.name: description
properties.value: Website updates are updates are updates which generally affect the main website but may also include content reveals and poll information.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Website updates

Website updates are updates are updates which generally affect the main website but may also include content reveals and poll information.

Chronological list of updates[edit | edit source]

Website updates are listed in reverse chronological order. For an alphabetical list, see Category:Website updates.

There are currently no website updates for 2022.

rawContent:

{{ToC|right}}
'''Website updates''' are [[updates]] are updates which generally affect the main website but may also include content reveals and poll information.

==Chronological list of updates==
Website updates are listed in reverse chronological order. For an alphabetical list, see [[:Category:Website updates]].

===2022===
<dpl>
category           = 2022 updates
category           = Website updates
namespace          = Update
order              = descending
ordermethod        = sortkey
include            = {Update}:date
format             = ,\n* [[{{#time: j F|,}}]] – [[%PAGE%|%TITLE%]]
noresultsheader    = There are currently no website updates for 2022.
</dpl>
